alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 4:49AM AKST until January 02 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 1 inch and ice accumulation of a glaze to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Susitna Valley south of Talkeetna, including Willow and Houston. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of light snow will transition to freezing rain during the day today. Multiple rounds of light precipitation are expected, so there will be some breaks where nothing is falling.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
